attributes.action: CANCEL BTEC/PEARSON EXAMS AND USE PREDICTED GRADES
attributes.additional_details: For Example students doing health and social care Exams have only found out now that the exams are going forward and some students do not go into colleges till next month as well as not having known or revised till this point and so there is not enough time to revise or learn to get the deserved grade.
attributes.background: give predicted grades for BTEC Pearson exams as lockdown did not allow students to revise and obstructed learning as they were told they were canceled until now. Hence why I’m writing to the government to cancel exams to predicted grades to reflect the hard work and true grade students should get.

rejection.details:
You may like to sign the following petition we currently have open on this issue:

Cancel BTEC summer exams
